title: Google’s cost-cutting kills Pixelbook division
description: Google hasn't made a laptop in 3 years, and won't be making one anytime soon.

title: Ubisoft is pretending it was never really that interested in NFTs
description: "We'll see if [NFT]s really answer the players' needs," CEO says.

title: Meta spins off PyTorch Foundation to make AI framework vendor neutral
description: PyTorch, which powers Tesla Autopilot and 150K other projects, will join the Linux Foundation.

title: Apple sends out iOS 15.7, macOS 12.6 with security updates as it releases iOS 16
description: Apple's past and present OSes are all getting updates today.

title: The 103 classic games that did, and didn’t, make the Atari 50 anniversary cut
description: Retailer leak suggests games from arcade to Jaguar; surprises apparently still await.

title: The clock speed wars are back as Intel brags about hitting 6 GHz with 13th-gen CPUs
description: Raptor Lake boosts clocks, cache, and core counts on the same Intel 7 process.

title: Dear Mr. President: Seriously, please stop with these science “moonshots”
description: Science needs sustainable, boring growth, but we just get flashy ill-formed initiatives.

title: Roku announces a cheaper subwoofer, updates $30 Express streaming device
description: Roku OS 11.5 with "Continue Watching" also en route.

title: Intel publishes Arc GPU specifications as their launch creeps ever-nearer
description: Intel's lineup will likely be competing with new GPUs from AMD and Nvidia soon.

title: Starlink appeals FCC rejection of $886M grant, calls reversal “grossly unfair”
description: Starlink says speed tests and $600 dish cost aren't good reasons to deny funding.

title: Remember Faraday Future? We rode in its new EV, and it wasn’t great
description: The vehicles it showed off at Monterey Car Week were far from production-ready

title: Apple raises iPhone 14 battery costs above pre-Batterygate levels
description: It's the first time genuine iPhone batteries have cost more than $70 since 2017.

title: Get your first look at the OnePlus 11 Pro and its round camera bump
description: Plus: Wild rumors say the phone might launch before the end of the year.

title: Flooded with AI-generated images, some art communities ban them completely
description: Smaller art communities are banning image synthesis amid a wider art ethics debate.

title: After Blue Origin’s rocket explodes, its spacecraft makes a dramatic escape
description: There were no passengers on board this flight carrying scientific instruments.

title: Netflix partners with Ubisoft to bolster fledgling gaming division
description: Streaming giant will launch three new mobile games next year based on Ubisoft hits.

title: How an enormous project attempted to map the sky without computers
description: The Carte du Ciel provided signposts for how future astronomical discoveries would be made.

title: Nick Fury takes the spotlight in first trailer for Secret Invasion
description: Also: trailer for Werewolf by Night, new footage from Loki S2, The Marvels, and more.
